hadiths.quote: The best of you are those who are best to their families.
None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
The strong person is not the one who can wrestle someone else down. The strong person is the one who can control himself when he is angry.
The most beloved of deeds to Allah are those that are most consistent, even if they are small.

Do not be people without minds of your own, saying that if others treat you well you will treat them well and that if they do wrong you will do wrong. But (instead) accustom yourselves to do good if people do good and not to do wrong if they do evil.
Kindness is a mark of faith, and whoever has no kindness has no faith.
Whoever does not show mercy to our young ones and respect to our elders is not one of us.
The best of people are those who are most beneficial to people.
Do not belittle any good deed, even meeting your brother with a cheerful face.
